name: Salomon Grom Visor Snow Helmet - Youths
description: Protection without weight. This helmet/visor combo is designed for small noggins. An adjustable sizing system means it stays in use for more than one season. The attached visor eliminates the need for detached goggles – so there’s one less thing to pack on your way to the slopes.Attached visor with orange tint lens (VLT 22%) offers versatile eye protection for bright and overcast days.Polycarbonate shell provides durable protection.EPS liner fused to shell absorbs shocks in the event of a fall.Custom Dial offers quick, easy adjustment for growing heads.Wide range of size adjustment, for several seasons of riding.Airflow venting keeps heads cool and reduces fog.Liner comes out for easy washing.
